    label style={font=\LARGE},
    %ylabel style={rotate=-90},
  }

  \begin{tikzpicture}[scale=0.51]
    \begin{axis}[
      title=Wavefront,
      xlabel=Block count ($\times10^3$ tasks),
      ylabel=Runtime (s),
      legend pos=north west,
    ]
    \addplot+ [mark=*] table[x=X,y=OpenMP,col sep=space]{Fig/micro_benchmark/matrix_operation.csv};
    \addplot+ [mark=|] table[x=X,y=TBB,col sep=space]{Fig/micro_benchmark/matrix_operation.csv};
    \addplot+ [mark=square*] table[x=X,y=Taskflow,col sep=space]{Fig/micro_benchmark/matrix_operation.csv};
    \legend{OpenMP, TBB, Cpp-Taskflow}
    \end{axis}
  \end{tikzpicture}
  %
  \begin{tikzpicture}[scale=0.51]
    \begin{axis}[
      title=Graph Traversal,
      xlabel=Graph Size ($|V|+|E|$),
      ylabel=Runtime (ms),
      legend pos=north west,
    ]
    \addplot+ [mark=*] table[x=X,y=OpenMP,col sep=comma]{Fig/micro_benchmark/graph_algorithm.csv};
    \addplot+ [mark=|] table[x=X,y=TBB,col sep=comma]{Fig/micro_benchmark/graph_algorithm.csv};
    \addplot+ [mark=square*] table[x=X,y=Taskflow,col sep=comma]{Fig/micro_benchmark/graph_algorithm.csv};
    \legend{OpenMP, TBB, Cpp-Taskflow}
    \end{axis}
  \end{tikzpicture}
  \caption{Performance comparisons (runtime vs problem size) between Cpp-Taskflow, TBB, and OpenMP on two micro-benchmarks.}
  \label{fig::micro_benchmark}
\end{figure}
